thread.section_title: David de Gea can become a Manchester United legend, says Ander Herrera – Metro
thread.title: David de Gea can become a Manchester United legend, says Ander Herrera
thread.title_full: David de Gea can become a Manchester United legend, says Ander Herrera

author: markbrus88
title: David de Gea can become a Manchester United legend, says Ander Herrera
text:
Ander Herrera is a huge fan of David de Gea (Picture: Getty) Manchester United midfielder Ander Herrera believes goalkeeper David de Gea has it in him to become a legend at the club if he wants to.
Man Utd 'on verge' of sealing £86m signing to delight Mourinho The Spanish shot-stopper continues to be linked with a big move to Real Madrid after some superb performances at Old Trafford again this season, having seen a move to the Bernabeu break down at the last minute in 2015.
Herrera hopes he stays at United, however, singling him out as one member of this current squad to go down as an all-time United great.
De Gea has won United’s player of the season for three years in a row (Picture: Getty) ‘For me he is the number one,’ he said. ‘Never before at United had been a goalkeeper (won) the best player voted by players and fans, and he has done it three years in a row.
More: Football Arsenal’s Player of the Month award is the most depressing ever 
Jurgen Klopp report card: Heavy metal football yet to strike a chord at Liverpool 
Arsenal ace names Chelsea star as PL's best player ahead of Sanchez and Ozil 
Manchester United fixtures West Brom (H) – Sat 1 Apr
Everton (H) – Tue 4 Apr
Sunderland (A) – Sun 9 Apr
Anderlecht (A) – Thu 13 Apr
Chelsea (H) – Sun 16 Apr
Anderlecht (H) – Thu 20 Apr
Burnley (A) – Sun 23 Apr
Man City (A) – Thu 27 April
Swansea (A) – Sun 30 April
‘It is a phenomenon and he has a gift of reflexes. I want him to stay and enjoy it because he is a goalkeeper who wins points.
‘He can become a United legend if he wants to.’
De Gea joined the Red Devils from Atletico Madrid back in 2011 and has won the Premier League, FA Cup and League Cup during his time in England.
MORE: Griezmann to Man Utd transfer on verge of completion
